project.description: This job demonstrates the usage of the "Create Cloudify Environment" build step, in combination with the "Cloudify Blueprint Selector" parameter type.

co.cloudify.jenkins.plugin.parameters.Bl.name: blueprint_id
co.cloudify.jenkins.plugin.parameters.Bl.description: ID of blueprint to create an environment from.

hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.name: inputs_file
hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.description: YAML/JSON file containing inputs for the new deployment. These inputs will be merged with the ones provided through a string (see below).

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: inputs
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: YAML/JSON containing inputs for the new deployment. These inputs will be merged with the ones provided through a file (see above).

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: outputs_file
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: File to create, containing the new environment's outputs and capabilities.
